original_text: Then Jesus said to the disciple, ‘Put your sword back in its place. People who use a sword to kill others will themselves die in the same way. Someone will kill them with a sword.
korean_text: 이에 예수께서 이르시되 네 칼을 도로 칼집에 꽂으라 칼을 가지는 자는 다 칼로 망하느니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to the disciple
Put your sword back in its place
People who use a sword to kill others
will themselves die in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 자신도 같은 방식으로 죽을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Someone will kill them with a sword
